Description: Available September 1st (or 8/1). Brand new construction with high end finishes in much sought after Brighton location just minutes from Boston College. This designer townhome style unit features features 5-6 bedrooms, 3 full bathrooms, high ceilings, hardwood floors, central A/C, washer/dryer in unit and luxurious finishes. Fully applianced chef's kitchen featuring Jenn Air stainless steel appliances, and granite coutertops. Massive backyard. Parking included in rent! Students accepted.* Unit is under construction.
